name: New Social Media Feeds: Templates and Demos
description:
Widgets for Social Media Feeds


We are continually updating the EmbedSocial platform, and this time we made an entire re-design of the look of our social media widgets in the EmbedFeed product.


EmbedFeed is an all-in-one social media aggregator integrated with the major social media networks, built to generate and display social media posts on any possible website.


EmbedFeed provides professional tools such as moderation, customization, custom CSS option to tag posts with custom links, and tons of settings that will help you to fit your social media feeds design with your brand.


Thousands of users use this product and regularly send their feedback on possible new features and upgrades.


Before starting to design, we had in mind the following principles: 

  • User needs, requests, and feedback 
  • Follow the latest UI design trends.
  • Responsiveness and fit to any device, browser, or a website builder


The research phase included a few workshops among our marketing, UX, and customer success teams. And lotâ€™s of pizza!


Hope this Figma file will inspire you and your work
